documentation.text:
@notice Returns the identifier of the extension
 @return _identifier The extension's identifier

@notice Returns the version of the extension
 @return _version The extension's version number

@notice Configures the extension
 @param _colony The colony in which the extension holds permissions

@notice Called when deprecating (or undeprecating) the extension
 @param _deprecated Indicates whether the extension should be deprecated or undeprecated

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct ColonyDataTypes.Expenditure memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct ColonyDataTypes.Payment memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct ColonyDataTypes.Expenditure memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct ColonyDataTypes.Domain memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct ColonyDataTypes.Payment memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct ColonyDataTypes.Domain memory)
function (address[] memory,uint256[] memory) pure returns (uint256,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)
function (address[] memory,uint256[] memory) pure returns (uint256,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

params._deprecated: Indicates whether the extension should be deprecated or undeprecated

params._payload: Function call to make via meta transaction
params._user: Address of user trying to do meta transaction

params._colony: The colony in which the extension holds permissions

makePayment(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Assumes that each entity holds administration and funding roles in the root domain

params._amounts: amounts of the tokens being paid out
params._callerChildSkillIndex: Index of the _callerPermissionDomainId skill.children array to get
params._callerPermissionDomainId: The domainId in which the _caller_ has the administration permission (must have funding in root)
params._childSkillIndex: Index of the _permissionDomainId skill.children array to get
params._domainId: The domainId the payment should be coming from
params._permissionDomainId: The domainId in which the _contract_ has permissions to add a payment and fund it
params._skillId: The skillId that the payment should be marked with, possibly awarding reputation in this skill.
params._tokens: Addresses of the tokens the payments are being made in. 0x00 for Ether.
params._workers: The addresses of the recipients of the payment

makePaymentFundedFromDomain(uint256,uint.details: Assumes that each entity holds administration and funding roles in the same domain,   although contract and caller can have the permissions in different domains. Payment is taken from domain funds - if the domain does not have sufficient funds, call will fail.

params._amounts: The amounts of the tokens being paid out
params._callerChildSkillIndex: Index of the _callerPermissionDomainId skill.children array to get
params._callerPermissionDomainId: The domainId in which the _caller_ has permissions to add a payment and fund it
params._childSkillIndex: Index of the _permissionDomainId skill.children array to get
params._domainId: The domainId the payment should be coming from
params._permissionDomainId: The domainId in which the _contract_ has permissions to add a payment and fund it
params._skillId: The skillId that the payment should be marked with, possibly awarding reputation in this skill.
params._tokens: The addresses of the token the payments are being made in. 0x00 for Ether.
params._workers: The addresses of the recipients of the payment

deprecate(bool).notice: Called when deprecating (or undeprecating) the extension

executeMetaTransaction(address,bytes,byt.notice: Main function to be called when user wants to execute meta transaction. The actual function to be called should be passed as param with name functionSignature Here the basic signature recovery is being used. Signature is expected to be generated using personal_sign method.

getCapabilityRoles(bytes4).notice: Return the permissions required for each function

getMetatransactionNonce(address).notice: Gets the next nonce for a meta-transaction

identifier().notice: Returns the identifier of the extension

makePayment(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Completes a colony payment in a single transaction

makePaymentFundedFromDomain(uint256,uint.notice: Completes a colony payment in a single transaction

version().notice: Returns the version of the extension
